result.markdown: --- title: "Research" from: markdown+emoji --- ### **[Deep-learning-based least-squares migration](resources/Torres_Deep-LSRTM_2022.pdf){target="_blank"}** Leveraging learned iterative reconstruction for LSRTM of synthetic and real seismic data. ::: {.cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} from IPython.display import IFrame as Image Image("images/full_results.pdf", width=1200, height=600) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=4} ```{=html} ``` ::: ::: ### Reflection waveform inversion Spetial flavor of FWI that exploits the tenuous low-wavenumber :rabbit: reflection kernel to recover a macro velicity model from reflection data. ### [A deep-learning inverse Hessian preconditioning](resources/EAGE_2023_preconditioning.pdf){target="_blank"} A network trained from migrated and re-migrated data avoids dependance on unavailable ground-truth labels to roughly approximate the inverse Hessian and accelerate iterative LSM. ### [Seismic inversion with nullspace networks](resources/Geophysical_prospecting_Torres_Sacchi_2022-3.pdf){target="_blank"} Deep neural networks explore the null space of the forward operator, enabling data-consistent and uncertainty-aware high resolution reconstruction of post-stack data. ### Reducing RTM artefacts via $f-k$ domain wavefield decomposition A simple implementation of frequency-wavenumber filtering to get rid of strong backscattering noise present in RTM sections. ### [Plane-wave FD modelling](https://nbviewer.org/github/kristiantorres/plane_wave/blob/master/Plane_wave/plane_wave_modelling.ipynb){target="_blank"} Examples with Devito for acoustic and elastic media. ### Master's thesis (in Portuguese).
